欘字的基本解释

欘
zhú
古代锄头一类的农具：“恶金以铸斤斧鉏夷锯欘，试诸木土。”
斧、锄等自然弯曲的把：“半矩谓之宣，一宣有半谓之欘。”
树木弯曲的地方：“（盐长之国）有木，……百仞无枝，有九欘。”

欘字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhú］
［《廣韻》陟玉切，入燭，知。］
(1)树枝弯曲。
(2)钁锄之属。
(3)古代计算角度的单位。

欘字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　欘； 康熙笔画：25； 页码：页564第14
【唐韻】陟玉切【集韻】【韻會】株玉切，?音劚。【說文】斫也。齊謂之鎡錤。一曰斤柄，性自曲者。【周禮·冬官考工記·車人】半矩謂之宣，一宣有半謂之欘，一欘有半謂之柯。【鄭註】倉頡篇有柯欘。【管子·霸言篇】匠人有以感斤欘，故繩可得而料也。俗作欘。　又【類篇】一曰木名。枝上曲。【山海經】神民之丘，建木百仞，無枝，有九欘，下有九枸。　又【類篇】直角切，音濯。鋤也。【爾雅·釋器】斪斸謂之定。【李巡曰】鋤別名。【玉篇】欘，或作斸。

欘字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
欘字的起名意思

暂无。

Zhan
Basic explanation of words
Zhan
zhú
Ancient farm tools such as hoes: "Evil gold is used to cast catty axe and barbarian sawing, try all kinds of wood and soil."
Axes, hoes and other naturally curved handles: "A half moment is called a declaration, and a half moment is called a declaration."
The place where the trees bend: "(The Kingdom of Salt) There are trees, ... a hundred cents without branches, there are nine trees.”
Zhan
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhú］
["Guangyun" Zhiyu cut, enter the candle, know. ]
(1) The branches are bent.
(2) The genus of Qiu hoe.
(3) The ancient unit of angle calculation.
Zhan
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　欘; Kangxi Strokes: 25; Page Number: Page 564 14
[Tang Yun] Zhiyu cut [Jiyun] [Yunhui] Zhuyu cut,? Yin 劚. [Said the text] Ye Ye. Qi said the 镃錤. One is Jin handle, those who are self-flexing. [Zhou Li·Dongguan Kao Gong Ji·Che Ren] Half a moment is called Xuan, one is half called Z, and the other is half called Ke. [Zheng's Note] There is Ke Zhu in the Cangjie article. [Guanzi·Bayan Chapter] The craftsman has a sense of weight, so the rope is available and expected. Popular as Zhu.　[Classes] One is the name of the wood. On the branch. 【Shanhaijing】The hill of gods and people is built with hundreds of thousands of woods, without branches, with nine trees and nine cemeteries underneath.　[Classes] Cut at right angles, sound. Hoe too. 【Erya·Release Device】We say that it is fixed. [Li Xun said] Hoe another name. [Jade articles] 欘, or Zuo 斸.
